NAME: Reflected XSS on Search Page
IMPACT: Attackers can execute scripts in users' browsers.
SOLUTION: Sanitize user input and use output encoding.

NAME: SQL Injection on Login
DESCRIPTION: SQL injection vulnerability in login form.
SOLUTION: Use parameterized queries and input validation.

NAME: Weak TLS Configuration
IMPACT: Traffic may be decrypted by an attacker.
SOLUTION: Disable weak ciphers and enforce modern TLS.
